#MovieTrivia At the end of takes in Inglourious Basterds (2009), as it was common in Quentin Tarantino's films, actors would face the camera and say “Hi, Sally”, referring to the film editor Sally Menke. It was her last collaboration with the filmmaker prior to her death in 2010. https://t.co/L6nsI0wEP8

I understand the mentality, "just skip to the part where they're already a team," like INGLOURIOUS BASTERDS or, "have them build comradery on the mission," like GUNS OF THE NAVARONE, but THE DIRTY DOZEN isn't about the mission, it's about the military and how they suck.
